In England, in the seven days to 19 April, there were 13,773 new confirmed cases (24.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 April, there were 16,454 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 16% (2,681 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 April is 3,847,341 (6,835.2 cases per 100,000 population).
